Name: ExternalId
Description: Application source identifier (Unique Id per record) for troubleshooting purpose

Name: CenterCode
Description: This will be provided by OneRehab team before onboarding.

Name: NRIC/FIN
Description: Validation will be enforced NRIC & FIN submitted, based on MHA algorithm checksum.

Name: EmploymentStatus
Description: Patient's Employment status prior to this episode

Name: PremorbidMobilityStatusComm
Description: Patient's Premorbit mobility status in community

Name: Address
Description:
Patient’s address 
Block Number, Street Name, Floor Number, Unit Number, Building Name (if applicable)

Name: RDGSecondaryOther1
Description: Patient secondary RDG Other Rehabilitation Diagnosis

Name: DateOfAdmission
Description: Also known as first Rehab session in community

Name: RelevantMedicalHistory
Example: This patient has good health for past 24 months
Description: For qualified clinician (Doctors) to enter relevant medical history to be passed down to downstream service providers

Name: Section 3 Start
Description: To indicate the start of Section 3

Name: EQ5D-5L admission form start
Description: To indicate the start of EQ5D-5L admission form

Name: UsualActivities
Description: Usual Activities (e.g. work, study, housework, family, or leisure activities)

Name: RateHealth
Description:
On a scale of 0 -100, how would you rate your health TODAY?
(0=worst health, 100=best health)

Name: EQ5D-5L admission form end
Description: To indicate the end of EQ5D-5L admission form
